text: "Dancing on the Ceiling" is a 1986 song by Lionel Richie and is the title track to the third studio album Dancing on the Ceiling. It went to number 1 in Norway and South Africa, number 2 in Australia and the United States, number 3 in Canada, Finland and Sweden, number 4 in Belgium, number 6 in Switzerland, number 7 in New Zealand and the United Kingdom, number 8 in the Netherlands, number 11 in Austria, number 13 in Germany and number 42 in France. ==Track listings== * 7" single # "Dancing on the Ceiling" - 4:20 # "Love Will Find a Way" - 6:10 * 12" single # "Dancing on the Ceiling" - 7:10 # "Love Will Find a Way" - 6:14 Category:1986 songs Category:Lionel Richie songs Category:Pop songs
title: Dancing on the Ceiling (Lionel Richie song)
